channel.title: SeaX Release Notes on
channel.description: Recent content in SeaX Release Notes on

item.title: SeaX Release History
item.description: 3/20/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Fixed the application process and procedure for purchasing numbers. 3/13/2025 # New Features and Improvements # Adjusted the display of failed WhatsApp campaigns to show failure reasons for all messages. Enabled WhatsApp message template activation. Fixed an issue causing errors in the campaign initiation process. 3/04/2025 # New Features and Improvements # MMS now correctly displays images in the conversation window.
